locations.text: How about this beautiful small shop in a slightly shady neighbourhood?

responses.text: Not much. But a great first shop.

locations.text: How this old store in a neighbourhood?

responses.text: You know you gotta decide for one place or another.
Nice and quiet. This will certainly be a little more low key.

locations.text: I found a cute little shack right next to a lake. This could be a beautiful place to open a  small restaurant. Do you like it?

responses.text: Too bad. It really looks like a place of peace. Just keep in mind we will run out of money eventually.
Such a beautiful place! I am looking forward to working here!

locations.text: How about opening your business right in the city center?

responses.text: I guess you don't like so much the busy life style.
City center it is! This is where life is happening.

menu.text: Let's start by adding some bananas to our stock pile. What do you think?

responses.text: Fantastic! I really don't know what I would have done if you had said no. I already ordered a ton.

random.text: Oh I think I just saw a rat. Should we hire someone to check this place and kill all rats?

responses.text: Risky. Who knows if there are more. But your choice.
I think that's wise. We don't want them to be seen by any customers later on.
